title: League of Legends Application not opening
body:
Hi Riot,

I have seen this problem come up in with a lot of other people and have tried to use their walk throughs on how to fix this problem (e.g. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3400854&page=1)
But for some reason my league app continues to bounce up and down in the dock and not open.

Please help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac)?

Yes, this'll be the third time I will have had to re-install my entire league game!

Is there not anything else to fix this issue?
